sentences.sContent: Like those chloroplast cells -- they're completely surrounded by other life.
sentences.sContent_eng: Like those chloroplast cells -- they're completely surrounded by other life.
sentences.sCn: 就像那些叶绿体细胞-它们全被其他生命所包围。

sentences.sContent: This will save energy and absorb CO2 as the bio-LED luminescence will cause the chloroplast to conduct photosynthesis.
sentences.sContent_eng: This will save energy and absorb CO2 as the bio-LED luminescence will cause the chloroplast to conduct photosynthesis.
sentences.sCn: 它不仅节能而且可以吸收 CO2，同时生物 LED 发光可导致叶绿体进行光合作用。

sentences.sContent: The chloroplast is “an amazing machine,” Strano says. “They are remarkable engines that consume carbon dioxide and use light to produce glucose,” a chemical that provides energy for metabolism.
sentences.sContent_eng: The chloroplast is “an amazing machine,” Strano says. “They are remarkable engines that consume carbon dioxide and use light to produce glucose,” a chemical that provides energy for metabolism.
sentences.sCn: 叶绿体是一个“令人惊艳的机器”，斯特拉诺说，“这些超级机器借助光将二氧化碳转化为葡萄糖”，一种为新陈代谢提供能量的物质。

trans.tranOther: a plastid containing chlorophyll and other pigments, occurring in plants and algae that carry out photosynthesis
